ENEMY_TYPES.title: Amond
ENEMY_TYPES.description: An atrocious criminal who rampaged throughout the entire galaxy. After being arrested by the Galactic Patrol he was freed by the Saiyan Turles.

ENEMY_TYPES.title: Daiz
ENEMY_TYPES.description: The prince of Pukinpa Dynasty on planet Kabocha. After attempting to defend his planet from Turles he then got recruited into the Turles Crusher Corps.

ENEMY_TYPES.title: Cacao
ENEMY_TYPES.description: He was turned into a battle Cyborg to fight in an interstellar war. After this, he became a galactic lone-wolf bounty hunter. He joined the Crusher Corp hoping to strengthen his cyborg body by eating the fruit of the tree of might.

ENEMY_TYPES.title: Rasin
ENEMY_TYPES.description: Revived from fossils by Turles and extract from the Tree of Might, The once extinct Beenz people are extremely intelligent. Along with Lakasei, they built Turles' spaceship and the rest of their ordnance.

ENEMY_TYPES.title: Lakasei
ENEMY_TYPES.description: Revived from fossils by Turles and extract from the Tree of Might, The once extinct Beenz people are extremely intelligent. Along with Rasin, they built Turles' spaceship and the rest of their ordnance.

ENEMY_TYPES.title: Turles
ENEMY_TYPES.description: A low-class Saiyan warrior. Turles is merciless, prideful and confident. His heart is a ball of pure evil, he lacks all empathy and doesn't care about the differences between good and evil.
